rules.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
rules.target: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
rules.effect: Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability. In addition, if one or more Adeptus Astartes units from your army are currently Battle-shocked, until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, a successful unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

rules.when: Your Movement phase, just after an Adeptus Astartes unit from your army Falls Back.
rules.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

rules.target: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
rules.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [ASSAULT], [HEAVY] and [IGNORES COVER] abilities.

rules.when: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has shot.
rules.target: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that had one or more models destroyed as a result of the attacking unit's attacks.
rules.effect: Your unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but it must target the enemy unit that just attacked it, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.

rules.when: Your opponent's Charge phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Charge move.
rules.target: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.
rules.effect: Until the end of the turn, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.
